summary: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.
cast: Brooke Shields|Christopher Atkins|Leo McKern|William Daniels|Elva Josephson|Glenn Kohan|Alan Hopgood|Gus Mercurio|Jeffrey Kleiser|Bradley Pryce|Chad Timmerman|Gert Jacoby|Alex Hamilton|Richard Evanson
title: El lago azul
